channel.title: Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC) was reportedly sold for $4.2B THE STORY…FROM THE BEGINNING
channel.description:
Yesterday afternoon, the Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC) was reportedly sold for [$4.2B](http://www.flocombat.com/article/42802-sources-zuffa-accepts-4-2-billion-bid-for-sale-of-ufc) to a group that includes William Morris Endeavor-IMG and The Kraft Group.
The promotion company was originally bought in 2001 by its current majority owners, Frank and Lorenzo Fertitta and Dana White, for $2m. That’s a 2100x return…
In a recent Bloomberg [video](http://www.bloomberg.com/news/videos/2016-06-07/how-to-turn-a-good-fight-into-a-billion-dollar-business), Lorenzo broke down how three childhood friends built a $4B empire and turned a floundering sport into one of the most popular in the world. Here’s the quick backstory.
you can read more here http://thehustle.co/the-rise-of-ufc
